PageContent.heading: Common Ways that Credit Fraud Is Committed Against the Bank (Static Screen Type 5)
PageContent.para: There are some common ways in which Clients can attempt to commit fraud against Standard Chartered. In this section, we will look at the following types in more detail
PageContent.caption: Financial Statement Fraud
Misrepresentation of Client Information
Facility and Collateral Fraud
Misappropriation of Loan Funds
